findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of Swan tokens
findings.description: The mint function allows the owner to mint an unlimited number of Swan tokens, potentially leading to inflation and loss of token value.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade via delegateBySig function
findings.description: The delegateBySig function can potentially allow an unauthorized script upgrade.

findings.title: Unprotected increaseAllowance and decreaseAllowance functions
findings.description: The approve function allows unlimited allowance to be set without any protections.

findings.title: Insecure use of _transfer, _mint, and _burn internal functions
findings.description: The contract uses insecure internal functions _transfer, _mint, and _burn which can lead to unauthorized token transfers or minting.

findings.title: Unsafe approval and transferFrom functionality in SafeBEP20 library
findings.description: The SafeBEP20 library contains unsafe approval and transferFrom functionalities which can lead to security vulnerabilities.
